homePage.landing: We are simply here to simplify your everyday TenTen is a new financial entity with the sole purpose of making payments easier, faster and generally less confusing in Egypt. We are currently building our top-notch fintech product
homePage.about: Innovation meets convenience in the realm of financial transactions. Born from a vision to revolutionize the way we handle money, our journey began in [year of establishment], inspired by the dream of creating a world where financial empowerment is accessible to all. At the heart of Tenten Pay lies a story of resilience and ambition. Our founders, a diverse team of tech enthusiasts, financial experts, and creative thinkers, shared a common frustration over the complexities and limitations of traditional payment methods. They envisioned a platform that was not just a service, but a seamless experience - one that caters to the needs of both individuals and businesses with equal finesse. What sets Tenten Pay apart is our commitment to simplicity and security. We understand that in a world where every second counts, you need a payment solution that is both efficient and trustworthy. Our platform is designed with state-of-the-art technology to ensure that every
homePage.whyTenTenContent: Contrary to popular belief, Lorem Ipsum is not simply random tex It has roots in a piece of classical Latin literature from 45 BC, making it over 2000 years ol Richard McClintock, a Latin professor at Hampden-Sydney College in Virginia, looked up one of the more obscure Latin words, consectetur
homePage.quickAccessContent: Instantly access Tenten, your all-in-one super app revolutionizing payments in the fintech landscape. Experience seamless and efficient payment processes at your fingertips
homePage.notificationContent: Explore Tenten has cutting-edge notification engine, delivering real-time updates and personalized alerts to keep you informed and engaged with our innovative fintech solutions.
homePage.securityContent: Ensuring robust security measures, Tenten prioritizes the protection of your sensitive data within our fintech ecosystem. Experience peace of mind with our state-of-the-art security protocols.

terms.content: By accessing or using our financial services and application, you agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions. Please read them carefully. Tenten Pay offers a range of digital financial solutions including electronic payments, transfers, and personal finance management. Your use of Tenten Pay is subject to your acceptance of these terms, which include our privacy policy and any other guidelines or rules applicable to specific services that may be posted from time to time. All such guidelines or rules are hereby incorporated by reference into these terms. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use Tenten Pay. We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time, so we encourage you to review them frequently.
privacyPage.intro: Tenten Pay understands the importance of your privacy and is committed to protecting it. This Policy describes the types of information we may collect from you or that you may provide when you visit our website or apps and our practices for using, maintaining, protecting and disclosing that information. This policy might be updated from time to time, so we recommend that you review this page periodically. In the event this Policy changes, we will inform you by posting an updated Policy on this web page. All changes will go into effect on the date noted above. The new Policy will apply to all past and current users of our website and will replace any prior Policies
privacy.infoCollectedTitle: What Information we collect and how we use it
privacy.infoCollectedContent1: We do not collect personally identifiable information from individuals unless they provide it to us voluntarily and knowingly. Visitors to our website and apps are not required to register or provide information to us in order to view our website or app, we need such information just in case they wanted to place an order or to contact us.
privacy.infoCollectedContent2: If you choose to establish a Tenten Pay account, we collect the following information about you: name, address(es), phone number, email address, and password. We use the information you supply for the purpose of providing the services you have requested, and as described in this Policy. In addition, we may from time to time contact you via email, SMS or phone unless you opt-out by following the instructions in the “opting out” section of this Policy.
privacy.infoCollectedContent3: If you shop with us, we collect the following information about you: name, addresses, phone numbers, email addresses, billing information including credit card numbers and expiration dates as well as the names, addresses and phone numbers of gift recipients (if any). We use your name, address, phone number and billing/credit card information to process your order or as otherwise described in this Policy.
privacy.infoCollectedContent4: The email address you provide is used for internal purposes, such as confirming and tracking your orders or as otherwise described in this Policy. We may also contact you occasionally via email, SMS or phone to keep you up-to-date on the latest Tenten Pay news. If you would like to opt out of receiving mailings from us, just let us know (see contact information below). Also, gift recipients may, from time to time, receive offers from us regarding new products and services that we think may be of interest to them. We allow gift recipients the option to opt out of receiving future marketing-related communications from us.
privacy.infoCollectedContent5: In certain instances, we may disclose your personally identifiable information when we have reason to believe that it is necessary to identify, contact or bring legal action against persons or entities who may be causing injury to you, Tenten Pay or others. We may also disclose your personally identifiable information when we believe the law requires it. In the event of a merger, consolidation or sale or transfer of all or substantially all of our company or its assets, personal information collected by our website may be transferred to the purchaser or the new company
privacy.cookiesTitle: Use of Cookies and Other Technology
privacy.cookiesContent: We use cookies and other analytics tools to help us to provide a better user experience and to better understand how you use your website.
privacy.accessTitle: Updating, Deleting, Editing Your Account Information
privacy.accessContent: After setting up an account with Tenten Pay, you can access, review, correct and/or delete all of the personally identifiable information you provided to us by emailing us at
privacy.securityContent: We take your privacy and security very seriously. For this reason, we maintain administrative technical safeguards that are designed to protect your personal information from accidental, unlawful or unauthorized destruction, loss, access, disclosure or use.
privacy.optingOutContent: If you would rather not receive marketing emails from us, please let us know by contacting us as indicated below.
privacy.contactContent: You may ask questions, submit comments and opt out of receiving updates and other mailings from us by contacting us via email at
